short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can auto reload your page after regular interval of time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our Page Refresh Chrome Extension - the ultimate solution for anyone looking to stay up-to-date with the latest information on their favorite websites! With our powerful extension, you can set custom time intervals for your pages to refresh automatically, ensuring that you always have the most current data available.

Whether you're keeping an eye on breaking news, tracking stock prices, or monitoring social media updates, our Page Refresh Chrome Extension makes it easy to stay in the loop. Plus, with its user-friendly interface and customizable options.
